item.title: ‘Snowdrop’ Bounces Back in Ratings As Yoo In Na Reveals Her Secret Identity
item.content:encoded: JTBC’S Snowdrop saw a slight rise in viewership ratings. According to Nielsen Korea, the 7th episode of Snowdrop scored an average nationwide viewership rating of 3.252 percent. This is higher

item.title: Junho and Lee Se Young’s ‘The Red Sleeve’ Ends With a Bang
item.content:encoded: MBC’s The Red Sleeve ended on its highest ratings yet, recording an average nationwide viewership rating of 17.4 percent. This is a triple increase from the show’s premiere rating of 5.7 percent.
